vv84:7.4: Vaṅkaṃ bhayā → vaṅkaṃ bhayaṃ (bj) | vaṅkambhayā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | dhaṅkaṃbhayā (mr)
vv84:10.1: kena → kena nu (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
vv84:18.3: cime → dumā ca te (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
vv84:21.3: vaggu ca susaṅgato ca → vaggu sumukho susaṃgato (bj) | vaggū ca susaṅgato ca (sya1ed, sya2ed)
vv84:36.1: ca sirīsavanā → ime sirīsūpavanā ca (bj) | ime sirisapavanā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ime pi sirīsapavarā ca (pts-vp-pli1ed) | ime pi sirīsavanā ca (pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
vv84:36.2: Dibbā → dibbā ca (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), surabhī → surabhiṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr), sampavanti → pavanti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sampavāyanti (mr)
vv84:48.3: teniha → tenīha (bj) | te na hi (sya1ed, sya2ed), bhasmī → bhasmi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | bhasma (mr)
vv84:53.2: purakkhatvā → purakkhipitvā (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed) | purakkhitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
vv84:57.3: Ānandī vittā → ānandacittā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | anandacittā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | ānandīcittā (mr)
